Elf

Fey Ancestry. You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can't put you to sleep. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.0VYIWN5IOCSKV0RH]{Fey Ancestry}

Trance. Elves don’t need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is “trance.”) While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.Q5DA9NC8HR3BFDL8]{Trance}

Darkvision. You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.EXHZKP41HJVW4RRK]{Darkvision}

Subrace. You get a subrace.

Drow*

Daylight Sensitive. You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.HI432Q4NOY2SSWPK]{Daylight Sensitive}

Drow Magic. You know the dancing lights cantrip. When you reach 3rd level you know the faerie fire spell and can cast it once with this trait, regaining the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level you know the darkness spell and can cast it once with this trait, regaining the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.HWNMOEJ176PTA8SU]{Drow Magic}

Wood Elf*

Swift Stride. Your base walking speed is 35 feet. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.L9WPC6VMN9NWCWID]{Swift Stride}

High Elf

Touched by Moon and Sun. You know one cantrip of your choice from the sorcerer spell list. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for that cantrip (chosen when you select this race). @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.DVM4WC4FFQ68KZQB]{Touched by Moon and Sun}

Eladrin

Feywild Influence. Whenever you take a long rest, you can choose a season to reflect your emotional state and corresponding spell to prepare. You can cast the chosen spell once without expending a spell slot and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, the chosen spell is cast as a 2nd-level spell. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (chosen when you select this subrace).

SeasonSpell
SpringCharm Person
SummerCommand
AutumnHeroism
WinterSleep
@Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.6O1E7USTROA0QPWM]{Feywild Influence}

Sea Elf

Child of the Sea. You have a swimming speed of 30 feet, and you can breathe air and water. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.J4GBRU0W62U8PED3]{Child of the Sea}

Shadar-Kai

Blessing of the Raven Queen. You have resistance to cold or necrotic damage (chosen when you select this subrace). @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.UM6UXJLMP5JJ9YHK]{Blessing of the Raven Queen}
